  • 构造器详细资料

    • TrailPiece

      public TrailPiece(greenfoot.GreenfootImage image, int actsToFade, int angle)
      Constructor for TrailPiece.
      参数:
      image - The image to use for the trail piece.
      actsToFade - The number of acts before the trail piece disappears.
      angle - The angle to set for the trail piece.

  • 方法详细资料

    • act

      public void act()
      Act - do whatever the TrailPiece wants to do. This method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button is pressed in the environment.
      覆盖:
      act 在类中 greenfoot.Actor
